name: Sewer's Plague
description:
The player embodies a plague knight whose goal is to protect a plague doctor from a zombie invasion. 

Use your shield with the right timing to gain mana and reflect the doctor's potions, and throw them to the ennemies.

 In exchange of your mana, ask the doctor to throw special potions on the battlefield ! Playable with keyboard.

Commands are optimized for QWERTY Keyboard

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$195816

This game was made during LudumDare46 by a team of 6 people :

-Antoine Nisoli : Programmer

-Antoine Cuvilliez : Game Art

-Pierre Morreel : Game Art

-Nicolas Revillon : Game Art

-Logan Berdah : Sound Design / Music composer

-Julien Prost : Music mixing
